name: Drifty League
description:
Drift as fast as you can around six challenging tracks in this fast paced simple and addictive arcade style racing game.


HOW TO PLAY:

Tap left and right to drift as smoothly as you can around the tracks whilst maintaining speed to improve on your fastest lap times!

Each complete lap of any track earns you coins which can be used to unlock faster cars. More complex tracks earn more coins and faster cars have coin multipliers!

Lap times for each track are submitted to game centre leaderboards so be sure to share with your friends to try and beat there fastest lap times!


PLEASE RATE AND SHARE:

If you enjoy playing this Drifty League please follow us on twitter/Facebook using the icons in the game to keep an eye out for upcoming updates and rate the game if you have the time.

Happy drifting and see you on the track!
